Top 30 Strongest Brands in Hong Kong (Kantar BrandZ 2024)

Based on the 2024 Kantar BrandZ report, which ranks brands by equity, cultural relevance, and demand power from consumer insights, here’s the full top 30 list. It reflects Hong Kong’s digital-savvy consumers favoring apps, finance, and travel.

2 Cathay Pacific Airlines

Lifestyle apps dominate the top spots, underscoring Hong Kong’s mobile-first culture, while banking and payments remain staples.
